title: Smart Data Models - GovHydro4
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Hydro turbine and governor. Represents plants with straight-forward penstock configurations and hydraulic governors of traditional 'dashpot' type.  This model can be used to represent simple, Francis, Pelton or Kaplan turbines.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovHydro4

at.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine gain (At).  Typical Value = 1.2. Default: 0.0

bgv0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 0 (Bgv0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

bgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 1 (Bgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

bgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 2 (Bgv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.1. Default: 0.0

bgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 3 (Bgv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.667. Default: 0.0

bgv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 4 (Bgv4).  Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0.9. Default: 0.0

bgv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Kaplan blade servo point 5 (Bgv5). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 1. Default: 0.0

bmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum blade adjustment factor (Bmax). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 1.1276. Default: 0.0

db1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional deadband width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

db2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Unintentional dead-band (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

dturb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Unit = delta P (PU of MWbase) / delta speed (PU). Typical Value = 0.5.  Typical Value Francis = 1.1, Kaplan = 1.1. Default: 0.0

eps.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Gmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

gmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum gate opening, PU of MWbase (Gmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

gv0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 0, PU gv (Gv0). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.1, Kaplan = 0.1. Default: 0.0

gv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.4, Kaplan = 0.4. Default: 0.0

gv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2, PU gv (Gv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.5, Kaplan = 0.5. Default: 0.0

gv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.7, Kaplan = 0.7. Default: 0.0

gv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.8, Kaplan = 0.8. Default: 0.0

gv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.9, Kaplan = 0.9. Default: 0.0

hdam.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Head available at dam (hdam).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pgv0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 0, PU power (Pgv0).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

pgv1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.42, Kaplan = 0.35. Default: 0.0

pgv2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.56, Kaplan = 0.468. Default: 0.0

pgv3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.8, Kaplan = 0.796. Default: 0.0

pgv4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4). Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.9, Kaplan = 0.917. Default: 0.0

pgv5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0.  Typical Value Francis = 0.97, Kaplan = 0.99. Default: 0.0

qn1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. No-load flow at nominal head (Qnl). Typical Value = 0.08.  Typical Value Francis = 0, Kaplan = 0. Default: 0.0

rperm.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Permanent droop (Rperm).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

rtemp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Temporary droop (Rtemp).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0

tblade.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Blade servo time constant (Tblade).  Typical Value = 100. Default: 0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gate servo time constant (Tg) (>0).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

tp.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Pilot servo time constant (Tp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

tr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Dashpot time constant (Tr) (>0).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0

tw.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

uc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max gate closing velocity (Uc).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

uo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max gate opening velocity (Uo).  Typical Vlaue = 0.2. Default: 0.0
